ingredients.item: 100ml juice from can of chick peas
250ml dairy-free unsweetened milk alternative (I used Koko Original)

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220C, gas mark 7. Divide the oil between a 6-hole muffin tin and place in the oven.

Meanwhile, sift the flour, gram flour and baking powder into a large bowl. Add a pinch of salt and good grinding of pepper. Whisk together the chick pea juice and milk alternative then beat into the dry ingredients until smooth; pour into a large jug.

Pour the batter into the muffin tin and place in the oven. Bake for 10 minutes then turn down the oven to 190C, gas mark 5 (donâ€™t open the door) and bake for a further 15 minutes until crisp, golden brown and cooked all the way through.
